import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Media, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Button, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Form, Label, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon } from 'reactstrap'; import one from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/1.jpg"; import three from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/3.jpg"; import two from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/user/2.png"; import timeline1 from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/social-app/timeline-1.png"; import timeline2 from "../../../../../../../../assets/images/social-app/timeline-2.png"; import { MoreVertical } from 'react-feather'; import LeftBar from './leftBar'; import RightBar from './rightBar'; import { ELANA, JasonBorne, AlexendraDhadio, OliviaJon, IssaBell, MoreCommnets, COD, Fast, Free, Submit, Cancel, VerticalStyle, Local, XYZSeller, ABCSeller, Standard, DeliveryOption, BuyingOption } from "../../../../../../../../constant"; const TimelineTab = ({ applicantData }) => { console.log("timelineTab applicantData", applicantData); const calculateRank = (points) => { return Math.floor(points / 1000); } return (
Quick information on your potential client
{"Here is the"} {"core"} {"highlights of this application - this is a potential hire - use this information to guage the"}readiness of hacker's and decide who is the best hacker for the job or best few (if multiple's selected)

Core user-data application information - info based on the 'applicants' submitted info

# of attached file(s){`${applicantData.attachedFiles.length} file(s)`}

This applicant has attached {applicantData.attachedFiles.length} file's that you should view as they we're intentionally included in this application.
Applicant placed wager/bid on self{applicantData.bettingOnSelfSelected === true ? "TRUE - Betting on SELF" : "FALSE - NOT betting on self"}

{`This applicant placed a ${Number(applicantData.waggeredBidAmount).toFixed(2)} ${process.env.REACT_APP_CRYPTO_TOKEN_NAME} wager/bet on`}'themselves'{` to WIN this listing - if this user wins, they will win ${Number(applicantData.waggeredBidAmount)} more tokens than the standard reward's...`}
{applicantData.referenceLinks.length} Reference Links Incl. {`${applicantData.referenceLinks.length} LINKS INCLUDED`}

This user has included {applicantData.referenceLinks.length} reference links. These can be anything useful regarding evaluating this applicant. These links can be anything from github to portfolio links to other misc content...
Number(#) of current reviews {`${applicantData.submittedUserData.reviews.length} TOTAL REVIEWS/COMPLETED JOBS`}

This applicant has a grand total of {applicantData.submittedUserData.reviews.length} total reviews/completed-gigs - if you'd like to check these reviews out... Visit the "Review Page" at the top of this page!
Year's of combined experience in cybersecurity{applicantData.submittedUserData.yearsOfExperience.label}

This applicant has approximately {applicantData.submittedUserData.yearsOfExperience.label} of combined experience in hacking or the cybersecurity space. This is submitted on behalf of the applicant themselves and this value is NOT verified - if you have any doubts of the experience of this user/applicant - look more into their background/history.
EXP/XP - Experience Points{applicantData.submittedUserData.points} EXP/XP POINTS

This applicant has a combined total of {applicantData.submittedUserData.points} experience/ranking points at the time of applying. There are approximately 50 LEVEL'S/RANKS within our {process.env.REACT_APP_APPLICATION_NAME} application. Each 1000 points equates to ONE level/rank. This user's rank is {calculateRank(applicantData.submittedUserData.points)}
{ELANA}

{"January, 12,2019"}

); }; export default TimelineTab;
